org.cip4.elk.alces.message
Class AbstractMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.cip4.elk.alces.message.AbstractMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
InMessageImpl, OutMessageImpl
public abstract class AbstractMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message

A base class for JMF messages sent and received by Alces.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Claes Buckwalter

public AbstractMessage(java.lang.String contentType,
                       java.lang.String header,
                       java.lang.String body,
                       boolean isSessionInitiator)
Creates a new Message.

Parameters:
contentType -
header - The Message's header. This usually corresponds to the HTTP header fields.
body - the content of the Message's body
isSessionInitiator - true if this Message initiated a TestSession

AbstractMessage

public AbstractMessage(java.lang.String header,
                       java.lang.String body,
                       boolean isSessionInitiator)
Creates a new Message. The content-type defaults to the JMF content-type (application/vnd.cip4-jmf+xml).

Parameters:
header - the Message's header. This usually corresponds to the HTTP header fields.
body - the content of the Message's body
isSessionInitiator - true if this Message initiated a TestSession

getTestResults

public java.util.List<TestResult> getTestResults()
Returns a List of TestResults from Tests performed on this Message. The TestResults are order in the order they were added to the Message.
